summary_text: RX 580 is AMD's most popular discrete graphics card according to the collected Steam Hardware Survey data. There are more of those than RTX 4090, RX 6800 XT, and RX 6900 XT combined. It does bear saying, however, that theSteam Hardware Survey is purely a representative sample of the tech used by gamers with Steam installed.

Intel's budget range graphics card, the Arc A380, was released in June last year as a direct competitor to Nvidia and AMD's offerings. Since then, Intel has faced some driver issues with DX11 and DX9 titles, because of which, there is a certain level of apprehension among gamers and GPU enthusiasts.

The Galaxy Book 3 Pro comes in two sizes - 14 inch and 16 inch. They have a Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with an adaptive refresh rate of up to 120Hz, and can cover 120 percent of the DCI-P3 color gamut. The screens have a resolution of 2880 x 1800.

Taiwanese laptop maker MSI on Thursday announced the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40 series GPU powered laptops at its 39MSIology The Leap to Singularity39 event. Powered by up to 13th Gen Intel Core HX series processors the new laptops are offered in MSIrsquos Stealth series Titan GT series Raider GE series Cyborg series Creator Z series and Prestige series. The new line ups are available for pre order in select countries with India launch expected on February 8.

The Galaxy Book3 Ultra comes with a 16-inch display with a resolution of 2880 x 1800 pixels. It features the latest 12th Gen Intel Core i7 and Core i9 Processors. Plus it comes with an NVIDIA GeForce 4070 Laptop GPU. It also comes with Thunderbolt 4, HDMI 2.0, and a 100W USB Type-C charger.

Powered by the latest 13th Gen Intel Core processor in i7 and i9 variants, the laptop is said to be the fastest Galaxy Book to date. It features a 16-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X Display with 3K resolution, and an adaptive 120Hz refresh rate. The Book3 Ultra is offered in 16GB and 32GB RAM variants and 512GB and 1TB of internal storage with an in-built expansion slot.

Quest Global, one of the world's fastest-growing engineering services firms, announced its development of new services and solutions, based on the NVIDIA Omniverse Enterprise platform. Quest Global will assist in delivering the best 3D visualization, simulation, design collaboration and digital twin solutions for the manufacturing and automotive industries.

China openly admits to using Intel and NVIDIA PC hardware obtained legally through online sellers from Taobao, Aliexpress, and more. The China Academy of Engineering Physics, or CAEP, still uses equipment and products purchased in 2020, including Intel processors and NVIDIA V100 graphics cards. The CAEP assisted China with its nuclear program and created the first hydrogen bomb for China.

Quest Global, one of the world's fastest-growing engineering services firms, announced its development of new services and solutions, based on the NVIDIA Omniverse Enterprise platform. Quest Global aims to facilitate the transformation of the traditional manufacturing processes and facilities by enabling manufacturers to augment their physical production environments with large-scale, AI-enabled, digital twin counterparts.

Taiwan Semiconductor, Nvidia, and Skyworks Solutions Rallied Today. Verizon Communications' stock price erode by nearly 2.5%, amid a general slump in tech stocks. Goldman Sachs Bull Case Sees S&P 500 Rebounding 12% in 2023.

Shares of NVIDIA Corp (Symbol: NVDA) have crossed above the average analyst 12-month target price of $204.59, changing hands for $209.43/share. When a stock reaches the target an analyst has set, the analyst logically has two ways to react: downgrade on valuation, or, re-adjust their target price.

Samsung's new Galaxy Book3 Ultra is the most powerful Galaxy notebook yet. It has a 16-inch OLED display that has a resolution of 2880 x 1800 pixels and a high 120Hz refresh rate. It's powered by Intel's latest 13th Gen H-series Core processors and can be equipped with up to 32GB of memory and 1TB of storage.

NVIDIA Sets Conference Call for Fourth-Quarter Financial Results for fiscal year 2023. CFO Commentary to Be Provided in Writing Ahead of Call. Call will be webcast live (in listen-only mode) on www.n Nvidia.com. The webcast will be recorded and available for replay until the companys conference call to discuss financial results for its first quarter of fiscal year 2024.

NVIDIA will host a conference call on Wednesday, February 22, at 2 p.m.PT (5 p. m. ET) to discuss its financial results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year 2023, which ended January 29, 2023. The call will be webcast live (in listen-only mode) on investor.n Nvidia.com. NVIDIA will provide written commentary on its fourth-quarter results from its CFO.

The update lets users with GeForce RTX 40-series GPUs use AV1 streams at 4K resolution with 60 frames per second and an 8Mbps bitrate. Discord streaming is done as a P2P affair, and when users with machines incapable of decoding that stream join, it will automatically switch to the older H.264 standard.

The Galaxy Book3 series is designed for those who need seamless multi-device connectivity and premium hardware to supercharge their productivity and creativity. For the first time, Samsungs Dynamic AMOLED 2X Display, first used in the Galaxy premium smartphone lineup display, is featured in the Book3 Ultra and Pro series. The Book3 Pro 360 features a 2-in-1 convertible form factor with S Pen functionality, and the Book 3 Pro features thin and light, mobility-first clamshell design.

Galaxy Book 3 series comprises three variants, including the highest-end Galaxy Book 3 Ultra. The Galaxy Book Pro and Pro 360 also come in 16-inch models, while the Pro can be bought in a smaller 14-inch model as well. Prices start at $1,249 for the Book 3 Pro and $2,399 for the Pro 360.

N Nvidia may have another monster GPU in the works, and the price could be outrageous. The card is said to deliver 18,176 CUDA cores and 48GB of memory clocked at 24Gbps across a 384-bit bus. The estimated total board power (TBP) is the real killer here  rumors point to 800 watts.

Amazon is currently offering the 2022 ASUS ROG Flow Z13 i7/16GB/512GB/RTX 3050 Gaming Laptop Tbalet for $1,399.99 shipped. Normally going for $ 1,700, this solid $300 price drop marks a new second-best price weve tracked to date. The keyboard will cover the screen while youre traveling and the touchscreen will allow you to draw or take notes.

Samsung India has just announced its latest lineup of thin-and-light laptops, the Galaxy Book3 Series for the market. The lineup includes the flagship Galaxy Book 3 Ultra, Book3 Pro 360 2-in-1, and the Book3. Samsung has added a 120Hz refresh rate-equipped 16-inch 3K-resolution Dynamic AMOLED 2X display. The company has also added a FHD-resolution webcam to the Ultra model for better video calling experience.

Samsung introduces the Galaxy Book 3 Ultra alongside a redesigned Pro series of laptops. All three laptops are up for pre-order today, with prices starting at $2,399. Samsung is also bringing back a 5G version of the Book 3 Pro 360, after last year's didn't add a follow-up.

The Samsung Galaxy Book 3 Ultra was announced today at Samsung's Unpacked product launch event. It improves upon its predecessor with an upgraded processor, graphics card, and display. The laptop's stunning 16-inch, 3K (2880 x 1800) display delivers 400 nits of brightness for visibility outdoors.

Samsung's new Galaxy Book 3 Ultra laptop is a step up from the Book 2 Pro. The 16-inch screen has a higher resolution and 120Hz refresh rate. It's the only model to come with optional 5G wireless. Samsung also has the Book 3 Pro and Pro 360, which are a notch below the Ultra in performance.

Samsung is adding a new top-tier notebook  the Galaxy Book 3 Ultra to its lineup. The new laptop borrows its Ultra moniker from the companys high-end handsets. The Ultra will come with the latest chips from Intel (13th Gen Core i7 or i9, up to 45W) and Nvidia (RTX 4050 or RTX 4070)

Nvidias next-generation Deep Learning Super Sampling 3 (DLSS 3) technology now supports Cyberpunk 2077. The game has a mode called Psycho Mode for its ray-traced lighting settings, which Nvidia says will create a visually stunning gaming experience. Nvidia has invested billions of dollars extra in real silicon and software to support these two functions.

Nvidia's next-generation Deep Learning Super Sampling 3 (DLSS 3) technology now supports one of the most popular and most demanding AAA video games, Cyberpunk 2077. The game has a mode called "Psycho mode" in the ray tracing lighting settings that creates a visually stunning gaming experience.

Intel's Arc graphics cards that launched in the fall of 2022 do provide some solid gaming performance for the price. The latest Arc graphics drivers offer gamers an FPS performance boost of up to 43 percent compared to the card's launch drivers. Intel also announced that gamers will be able to get free access to two upcoming games in a new A750 bundle.

Users of Nvidia GeForce graphics cards are reporting a bug that slightly hobbles GPU memory speeds when running the Discord instant messaging app. Reportedly, memory speeds are reduced by 200MHz. Nvidia says an "over the air update" will be pushed to PCs at a later date.

NVDA has been the topic of a number of recent analyst reports. Truist Financial raised their price target on shares of NVIDIA from $198.00 to $238.00 and gave the company a buy rating in a report on Monday, January 23rd. Morgan Stanley decreased their price objective on NVIDIA from. $182.000 to $175.000 and set an equal weight rating for the company in a. report on Thursday, November 17th.

A new update to the Discord app has caused NVIDIA graphics card memory clocks not to reach their full speeds when a user launches a game when Discord is running in the background. NVIDIA is aware of this rather odd bug, and a software update is in the works. The bad news is that there's no word on when that update will be released.

Several equities analysts have weighed in on NVDA shares. Cowen boosted their target price on shares of NVIDIA from $200.00 to $220.00 in a research report on Monday, December 12th. Truist Financial lifted their price objective on NVIDIA to $238.00 and gave the company a buy rating. HSBC began coverage on NVIDIA in aResearch note on Thursday, December 15th. The stock presently has a consensus rating of Moderate Buy.

PC sales dropped 51 percent year-over-year, but AMD ekeed out a small profit. CEO Lisa Su confirmed that AMD has been undershipping chips for a while now to balance supply and demand. Strategic under-shipping helps companies maintain higher prices for their wares.

There's a problem with the NVIDIA driver profile for the popular chatting and screen-sharing app Discord. Users on the LTT forums report VRAM clocks some 200-300 MHz lower than expected. This appears to be down to a change in the Discord application itself, and is not necessarily a bug.

The Book 3 Ultra is an impressively thin and light laptop, weighing 1.79kg (3.9 pounds) and measuring 16.5mm (0.64 inches) It uses Intels Core i7 and i9 processors, and those are paired with NVIDIAs RTX 4050 and 4070 graphics cards. The Book Ultra is heftier than the other Book 3s, but it also offers a generous array of ports including HDMI, microSD and two Thunderbolt 4 USB-C sockets.

) since it bottomed in October, up more than 90% through its highs last week. We believe NVDA's outperformance is closely linked to the hype surrounding OpenAI's ChatGPT. As the clear leader in the AI ecosystem, Nvidia is well-positioned to benefit from the hype.

The NVIDIA Shield Android TV Pro streaming media player now arrives with a $179.99 sale price with free shipping across the board. It comes within $5 of our previous mention from nearly 2 months ago, and is the second-best price weve seen in the past 6 months. Amazon is currently offering the Fire TV Stick for $129.99 shipped.

Institutional investors own over 50% of the company, so together than can probably strongly influence board decisions. The largest shareholder is The Vanguard Group, Inc. with 8.3% of shares outstanding. With a 31% ownership, the general public, mostly comprising of individual investors, have some degree of sway over NVIDIA. The CEO will answer to the board, even if he or she is a member.

Cyberpunk 2077 now supports DLSS 3 offering a more realistic and immersive rendering of the hugely popular science-fiction role-playing game.DLSS 3 is a package that includes a number of sophisticated technologies. Combining DLSS Super Resolution, all-new DLSS Frame Generation, and NVIDIA Reflex, it multiplies performance while maintaining great image quality.

A recent update to the desktop program is causing problems for some video cards, especially Nvidia. In particular, there would be declines in fino at 200 MHz in terms of memory clock. Nvidia is well aware of this problem and has already published a support page that allows you to temporarily stem the issue by going through GeForce 3D Profile Manager.

The Alienware Aurora R15 desktop comes powered by 13th Gen Intel Core Raptor Lake processors. The desktop supports ray-traced 4K gaming at 60+ FPS and enhanced overclocking. It also supports NVIDIA DLSS 3 AI (Artificial Intelligence) technology for AI-based acceleration.

DLSS 3 is a combination of DLSS Super Resolution, NVIDIA Reflex, and Frame Generation. It is an intensive AI process involving specific hardware that can generate new frames to boost performance. DLSS 3 delivers over double the performance using less power. Latency, another critical area, is improved over just using DLSS 2.

Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger is to take a 25% pay cut, and UK cybersecurity firm Darktrace is launching a 75m buyback plan after fraud allegations. sentiment on the EV industry seems to be improving, with the Global X Lithium & Battery Tech ETF rising 20.7% in January.

Despite its stumble to start the current trading week, the Nasdaq Composite is up 12% from the low point it reached near the end of last year. If this is the shape of things to come, that bear market may well be ending. The underlying support for this rally is extremely lopsided.

DLSS 3 is the third whole-number iteration of NVIDIA's Deep Learning Super Sampling. It uses AI to generate additional frames, effectively increasing the temporal resolution of the game. DLSS is coming to Hitman 3, Dakar Desert Rally, Deliver Us Mars, Marvel's Midnight Suns, and Perish.

Several research analysts have commented on the company. Morgan Stanley lowered their price target on NVIDIA from $182.00 to $175.00 in a report on Thursday, November 17th. Summit Insights upgraded NVIDIA from a hold rating to a buy rating in a research report on Wednesday, November 16th. Susquehanna. increased their price objective on shares of NVIDIA from. $180.000 to $185.00 and gave the company a positive. rating.

ChatGPT launched on November 30, and since then it has shown a capacity for a range of tasks, such as writing stock stories. The buzz has exploded, and OpenAI is getting a reported $10 billion investment from Microsoft. Shares of AI tech suppliers like Nvidia and Ambarella have jumped since the launch of ChatGPT.

Artificial intelligence stock prices have soared since ChatGPT launched. Nvidia, Mobileye, Ambarella, C3.ai and Alteryx are some of the companies riding the wave. Microsoft recently announced a $10 billion investment in OpenAI, a company that develops AI software.

A recent Discord update may have introduced a bug that slows down your Nvidia GPU when you use the popular voice chat app. Not all cards are affected, but it appears that the vast majority of them might be. Even older graphics cards suffer from this problem, and as per the Steam Hardware Survey, those GPUs still make up the majority of the market.

A glitch has appeared after Discord's recent update, rendering certain NVIDIA graphics cards to have their memory downclocked by 200 MHz. NVIDIA is currently working to alleviate the problem, and to see confirm whether the issue was due to the recent enablement of AV1 for NVIDIA GPUs within Discord. The company quickly offered a workaround while attempting to fix the problem.
